content: प्रह्व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Sloping, slanting, inclined; <ls>Śi. 12. 56.</ls> {@--2@} Stooping, bent down; bowing humbly down; एष प्रह्वोस्मि भगवन् एषा विज्ञापना च नः <ls>Mv. 1. 47</ls>; <ls n="Mv.">6. 37.</ls> {@--3@} Submissive, humble, modestly submitting; प्रह्वेष्वनिर्बंधरुषो हि संतः <ls>R. 16. 80.</ls> {@--4@} Devoted or attached to, engaged in, engrossed by.
